snippet: A rare poster collection stolen by the Nazis in 1938 has been returned to the owner's son and will be sold.
abstract: A rare poster collection stolen by the Nazis in 1938 has been returned to the owner's son and will be sold.

headline.main: Poster Collection Taken by Nazis to Be Sold
headline.print_headline: Posters Stolen by Nazis to Be Sold at Auction
